member.name: M:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SignalGenerator_AgilentESGE4438C.ARB_DownloadWaveform(System.String[],AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.ISignalGenerator_ARB.ARBMemory,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Download the waveform in ARB, if InterleavedData parameter is false, FileName is an array of three items, I file name, Q filename and interleaved output filename. If InterleavedData is true, only one item is necessary, the name of the file already formatted

member.name: M:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SignalGenerator_AgilentESGE4438C.ARB_SetupWaveform(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Load the waveform file indicated by FileName, if the FileNAme conatins a WIN Path, it parses the file by removing folder path and extention, If InterleavedData is true, in case the waveform is not present it searches for a IQ file, otherwise it loos for file finishing with _i and _q
member.param: If true, in case the waveform is not present it searches for a IQ file, otherwise it loos for file finishing with _i and _q

member.name: M:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.Utilities.ParseFile(System.String,AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.Utilities.FileSystem)
member.summary: Return a parsed file separated in path and file name in an array
member.returns: String array of two items, first item the path, second is the file name

member.summary: File name and path of the file on the client used during the downlaod

member.name: M:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.FTPClient.Upload
member.summary: Upload the file indicated by the property UploadFileName to the ftp server on the current selected directory, overwrite by deleting the current file if the property upload overwrite is true

member.name: M:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.FTPClient.DeleteFile(System.String)
member.summary: Delete file on ftp server, return false if it is not successful

member.name: M:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.FTPClient.ClearError

member.summary: File Name And Path location on the FTP server during the downloading

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.FTPClient.UploadOverwrite

member.name: M:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.FTPClient.GetLengthFileOnServer(System.String)

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SCPIInstrument.Timeout
member.summary: Timeout in msec for Visa or Telnet Communication

member.name: M:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_ACPGetResults
member.summary: This function queries the Spectrum analyzer by fetching the ACP dBc relative power results for each bandwidth and the dBm power of the carrier bandwidth. It is necessary to trigger the instrument by SystemMode_TriggerAndWait before calling this function otherwise old data are given back
member.returns: Double Array of 11x2 values that contain in the order the dBc relative power level of the main carrier and the dBm absolute power of main carrier, neg ACLR1, pos ACLR1, neg ACLR2, pos ACLR2... neg ACLR5 and pos ACLR5. In case of -999 values the offset has not been selected for this measurement

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_MCPActivatedFrequencyList
member.summary: Set or Get the frequency offset measured during Multi Carrier Power Measurement
member.value: The value is an enum that indicates all frequency offset (ALL), third-fifth-seventh offset(TFS), third order intermodulation (TOI)

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_MCPBaseFrequenciesDelta
member.summary: Set or Get the Delta Frequency between the carriers in Multiple Carrier Power Measurement
member.value: The delta is expressed im MHz and the possible values are: -15,-10,-5,5,10,15

member.name: M:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_MCPGetResults
member.summary: This function queries the Spectrum Analyzer by fetching the MCP dBc relative power level of the carrier bandwidths and the dBm absolute power It is necessary to trigger the instrument by SystemMode_TriggerAndWait before calling this function otherwise old data are given back
member.returns: Double Array of 8x2 values that contains in the order the dBc and dBm power of the first and second carrier and the relative dBc and dBm power of neg ACLR1, pos ACLR1, neg ACLR2, pos ACLR2... neg ACLR3 and pos ACLR3. In case of -999 values the offset has not been selected for this measurement

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_MCPMeasurementReference
member.summary: Set or get the carrier reference for Multi Carrier Measurement, it can be automatic, average, lower carrier or upper carrier

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_MCPRelativePowerList
member.summary: Set or Get the list specifing the relative Power Limit Mask for MCP measurement, example: "-47,-50,-50,-50"

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_OccupiedBandwidthSpan
member.summary: Set or Get the Span used during Ocuppied Bandwidth measurement
member.value: Span is in MHz and between 0.10 and 10 MHz

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_SEMActivatedFrequencyList
member.summary: Set or Get the list of 1 and 0 specifing which integration bandwidth to activate in SEM measurement

member.name: M:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_SEMGetResults
member.summary: This function queries the Spectrum Analyzer by fetching the peak and absolute power level for each SEM integration bandwidth. It is necessary to trigger the instrument by SystemMode_TriggerAndWait before calling this function otherwise old data are given back
member.returns: Double Array 11x3 , the first column contains absolute power for each integration bandwidth, the second column contains the peak absolute power for each integration bandwidth, the third column contains the peak frequency for each integration bandwidth. The first row contains the central bandwidth (only absolute value),the second one the negative offset A, the third one the positive offset A... up to region E If an integration bandwidth is not selected, the value is -999

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_SEMRBWList
member.summary: Set or Get the list of the offset resoultion bandwidth for each integration bandwidth in SEM measurement
member.value: Example value is: "30 kHz,30 kHz,30 kHz,1 MHz,1 MHz"

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_SEMRBWMultiplierList
member.summary: Set or Get the list specifing the multiplier of the offset resoultion bandwidth for each integration bandwidth in SEM measurement

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_SEMSideBandSetupList
member.summary: Get or Set the list specifing the sideband for each integration bandwidth in SEM

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_SEMStartAbsolutePowerList
member.summary: Set or Get the list specifing the Start Absolute Power Level for each integration bandwidth in SEM

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_SEMStartFrequencyList
member.summary: Set or Get the list specifing the Start Frequency for each integration bandwidth in SEM
member.value: Example value is: "2.515 MHz,2.715 MHz,3.515 MHz,4 MHz,12.5 MHz"

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_SEMStopAbsolutePowerCouplingList
member.summary: Set or Get the list specifing whether or not to couple the offset stop absolute power limit to the offset start absolute power limit for each integration bandwidth in SEM

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_SEMStopAbsolutePowerList
member.summary: Set or Get the list specifing the Stop Absolute Power Level for each integration bandwidth in SEM

member.name: P:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_SEMStopFrequencyList
member.summary: Set or Get the list specifing the Stop Frequency for each integration bandwidth in SEM
member.value: Example value is: "2.715 MHz,3.515 MHz,4 MHz,12.5 MHz,13 MHz"

member.name: M:AndrewIntegratedProducts.InstrumentsFramework.SpectrumAnalyzer_AgilentPSAE4445A.WCDMAMode_EVMGetResults
member.summary: This function queries the Spectrum Analyzer by fetching the EVM data results. It is necessary to trigger the instrument by SystemMode_TriggerAndWait before calling this function otherwise old data are given back
member.returns: Index 0 contains EVM RMS, index 1 PCDE, index 2 frequency error
